amendment.description: to modify a provision defining advance appropriations subject to limit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 209 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Cochran. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2930) to modify a provision defining advance appropriations subject to limit.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 209 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 209 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Cochran.
